about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: International Experience
about.bio: Fernando Campos, founder of Fields Barbers, honed his craft over nearly three years in Dublin, working at some of the city's most prestigious barbershops. His international experience and fluent English allow him to serve a diverse clientele, bringing the same level of excellence you'd find in Europe's finest barbershops in Córdoba.
about.differentiatorDesc: Bilingual service for international and local clients with the same level of excellence
about.experienceDesc: Trained at Ireland's most prestigious barbershops with advanced European techniques
about.passionDesc: Artisanal dedication in every cut, combining tradition with modern trends
